Class FareService

java.lang.Object
ISO2.Exe2.service.FareService
public class FareService extends Object
Fare Service divided into small, testable methods. Each rule is in its own method with only necessary parameters.

  • Constructor Details

    • FareService

      public FareService()
      Default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • determineFare

      public FareOffer determineFare(int age, int flightsPerYear, boolean isStudent, boolean livesWithParents, double income, CabinClass preferredClass, DestinationRegion preferredRegion, boolean travelsWithChildren)
      Determines the most suitable fare offer for a customer based on their profile. Delegates to specific rule methods for better testability.
      Parameters:
      age - Customer age in years
      flightsPerYear - Number of flights taken per year
      isStudent - Whether customer is a university student
      livesWithParents - Whether customer lives with parents
      income - Annual income in euros
      preferredClass - Preferred cabin class (ECONOMY or BUSINESS)
      preferredRegion - Preferred travel region
      travelsWithChildren - Whether customer travels with children under 12
      Returns:
      FareOffer if eligible, null otherwise

    • checkPajarilloFare

      public FareOffer checkPajarilloFare(int age, int flightsPerYear)
      Rule 1: Pajarillo Fare For minors who travel frequently.
      Parameters:
      age - Customer age
      flightsPerYear - Number of flights per year
      Returns:
      Pajarillo offer or null

    • checkGorrionFare

      public FareOffer checkGorrionFare(int age, int flightsPerYear, boolean isStudent, CabinClass preferredClass)
      Rule 2: Gorrión Fare For young students traveling in economy class monthly.
      Parameters:
      age - Customer age
      flightsPerYear - Number of flights per year
      isStudent - Whether customer is a student
      preferredClass - Preferred cabin class
      Returns:
      Gorrión offer or null

    • checkYoungTravelerFares

      public FareOffer checkYoungTravelerFares(int age, int flightsPerYear, boolean isStudent, boolean livesWithParents, CabinClass preferredClass)
      Rules 3 and 4: Young Traveler Fares. For young workers traveling in economy class.
      Parameters:
      age - Customer age
      flightsPerYear - Number of flights per year
      isStudent - Whether customer is a student
      livesWithParents - Whether customer lives with parents
      preferredClass - Preferred cabin class
      Returns:
      Young traveler offer or null

    • checkDiscoverEuropeFares

      public FareOffer checkDiscoverEuropeFares(int age, double income, int flightsPerYear, CabinClass preferredClass, DestinationRegion preferredRegion, boolean travelsWithChildren)
      Rules 5 and 6: Discover Europe Fares. For mature adults with middle income traveling to Europe in economy.
      Parameters:
      age - Customer age
      income - Annual income
      flightsPerYear - Number of flights per year
      preferredClass - Preferred cabin class
      preferredRegion - Preferred travel region
      travelsWithChildren - Whether customer travels with children
      Returns:
      Discover Europe offer or null

    • checkDiscoverWorldFares

      public FareOffer checkDiscoverWorldFares(int age, double income, int flightsPerYear, CabinClass preferredClass, DestinationRegion preferredRegion, boolean travelsWithChildren)
      Rules 7 and 8: Discover the World Fares. For mature adults with high income traveling to Asia/America in business.
      Parameters:
      age - Customer age
      income - Annual income
      flightsPerYear - Number of flights per year
      preferredClass - Preferred cabin class
      preferredRegion - Preferred travel region
      travelsWithChildren - Whether customer travels with children
      Returns:
      Discover World offer or null

    • isMinor

      public boolean isMinor(int age)
      Checks if customer is a minor (age less than 18).
      Parameters:
      age - the customer age
      Returns:
      true if age is less than 18

      public boolean isYoungAdult(int age)
      Checks if customer is a young adult (18-25 years old).
      Parameters:
      age - the customer age
      Returns:
      true if age is between 18 and 25 inclusive

      Returns:

      Returns:
      true if flightsPerYear is 12 or more

    • hasMiddleIncome

      public boolean hasMiddleIncome(double income)
      Checks if income is in middle range (between 20000 and 35000 exclusive).
      Parameters:
      income - the annual income
      Returns:
      true if income is greater than 20000 and less than 35000

    • hasHighIncome

      public boolean hasHighIncome(double income)
      Checks if income is high (35000 or more).
      Parameters:
      income - the annual income
      Returns:
      true if income is 35000 or more
